name: Twist Dark (TwistApp)
description:
A quick sunday-afternoon attempt at making the Twist (by todoist) website dark.

I put this together over a period of about 2 hours. It's neither perfect, refactored nor refined. I just wanted a dark theme for Twist.

Note: In the screenshot I've zoomed out to roughly 80%. With default 100% zoom the site's "center column" actually fills the window completely.
additional_info:
v0.1.3 - Fix text in markdown code blocks; make topbar a pleasant gray color instead of an intrusive blue color
v0.1.2 - Search results fixed
v0.1.1 - Markdown code blocks inside comments/messages are dark now; Fix border lines in Move Thread dialog
v0.1.0 - Initial release
